text: Each retry must verify the HMAC - SHA256 signature header to ensure authenticity before processing .
Every attempt , regardless of outcome , should be logged in the webhook_retry_history table with the status ( success / failure ) and corresponding response code .
Additionally , the delivery process must meet an SLA of achieving successful delivery within 2 minutes at the 95th percentile ( P95 ) .
achieving successful delivery within 2 minutes at the 95th percentile ( P95 )
